guide.title: Gentoo Linux Kernel
guide.subtitle: Main Page (Work in progress)
guide.abstract: The Gentoo Linux Kernel project has the goal of bringing a consistent kernel featureset across all architectures supported by Gentoo Linux.

body.p: With the growing number of architectures being supported by Gentoo Linux, we needed to set direction for our kernels. The goal of which is to try and give the best possible kernel featuresets across all platforms. By having a clearly set management team with published objectives, established timelines, and project accountability, the project will help bring the end-user experience for our kernels to even higher levels.

Current Gentoo Kernel sub-projects:
Project: Description:
alpha-sources Gentoo Kernel supporting alpha processors
arm-sources Gentoo Kernel supporting arm processors
gentoo-sources Gentoo Kernel supporting x86 processors
gs-sources Gentoo Kernel supporting x86 processors
mips-sources Gentoo Kernel supporting MIPS processors
pfeifer-sources Developmental Gentoo Kernel which moves it's code base into gentoo-sources
ppc-sources Gentoo Kernel supporting PPC processors
sparc-sources Gentoo Kernel supporting SPARC processors
xfs-sources Gentoo Kernel supporting x86 processors
